channel.title: Minnesota AG Press Releases
channel.description: Latest press releases from the Minnesota Attorney General's Office

item.title: Attorney General Ellison enters into settlement dissolving charity for governance violations
item.description:
Publication Date: May 23, 2025

Give Hope failed to register and meet basic governance standards, maintain its tax-exempt status

https://www.ag.state.mn.us/Office/Communications/2025/05/23_GiveHope.asp

item.title: Attorney General Ellison opposes opening the door to political purges
item.description:
Publication Date: May 23, 2025

New Trump employment classification, Schedule F, would strip civil-service protections from tens of thousands of nonpartisan federal employees and risk eroding the effectiveness of the federal government

https://www.ag.state.mn.us/Office/Communications/2025/05/23_OPM.asp
